title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
content: Here to sell a clash of clans account (level 185+) with 38K gems (and more...)Bargain chance also for resellers since this is offered at a very CHEAP PRICE (no account are sold with so much gems...)Short information:walls = level 12 (some pieces also 13)King level 55+Queen level 60+Magician level 22+See picturesOnly gems are worth more than 340+ euro. +250+ medals ready to be spent (you can exchange for 20 millions of gold or 200+ gems)included some artifacts! You can also change your nickname. Only one owner.Available for all platforms (android or iphone)AUCTION ENDING 5 MARCH at 22 CEST timePRICE START AT: 70 euro (payment to be done in btc use preev.com for conversion)BUY IT NOW: 340 euroPlease note I will not contact anyone for first in private or any social network.
